inventorymanagement.controller

Class OAuthController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
      • inventorymanagement.controller.OAuthController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.security.config.annotation.SecurityConfigurer<javax.servlet.Filter,org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.WebSecurity>, org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.WebSecurityConfigurer<org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.WebSecurity>

    @EnableOAuth2Sso
 @RestController
 @EnableWebSecurity
public class OAuthController
extends org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
    Controller that handles requests for Authentication using Google OAuth

    manrajsingh

      inventorymanagement.model.LoginResponseModel user(java.security.Principal principal, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)

    • Method Detail

      • user

        @RequestMapping(value="/userLogin",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
 @ResponseBody
public inventorymanagement.model.LoginResponseModel user(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                                                                                                                                            throws inti.ws.spring.exception.client.UnauthorizedException,
                                                                                                                                                                   inti.ws.spring.exception.client.ForbiddenException,
                                                                                                                                                                   inti.ws.spring.exception.client.BadRequestException
        Controller method that handles post authentication which adds user to the database, if not added and returns response with important session details
        Parameters:
        principal - OAuthResponse from Google OAuth
        session - HttpSession to set session attributes
        Returns:
        LoginResponseModel
        Throws:
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.UnauthorizedException - Thrown when user is not authorized
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.ForbiddenException - Thrown when no response is received from Google OAuth
        inti.ws.spring.exception.client.BadRequestException - Thrown when any of the field is empty
